column4: for the record, having gparted in the edgy installer is a HUGE mistake. the textmode installer from breezy and dapper were just fine...so developers, if you're out there, take heed.
yeah the text installers were great, they were very intuitive I thought, but I guess some couldn't use them
you can always use the alternate isos
I guess...but then I'd have to spend 1.5 hrs dl-ing one iso only to find out that i need another.
no you wouldn't, you would know get the alternate iso
well, then again, I'd never dl edgy...no lts.
are you on server or something
I mean how much support do you need
If they support for 18 months, I am going to stop using edgy in 6 months anyways, so not a big deal
oh. let me rephrase. well then again, I'd never dl edgy. i'm caveman.
